actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the research credit permanent and to increase the alternative simplified research credit.
short_title: Research and Development Tax Credit Extension Act of 2013

summary.text: Research and Development Tax Credit Extension Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make permanent the tax credit for increasing research activities, and (2) increase the rate of the alternative simplified research tax credit.

titles.title: Research and Development Tax Credit Extension Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the research credit permanent and to increase the alternative simplified research credit.
